评论详情: Got this for a work event and it was perfect. Got several compliments on it throughout the night. Definitely need to iron before wearing. Material is fairly thin and could benefit from wearing some sort of shape wear under it.  Overall I highly recommend
Perfect wedding guess dress, I got a medium but wish I got a small :( but that’s my own fault! In terms of quality the dress is beautifully made!!!

Nice dress to wear to a summer wedding! It is a very thin material, but the cut is cute and flattering. It's a silky material making it comfortable to wear. I got so many compliments on it. The color is really beautiful
This dress was very elegant, it was great for my work Christmas party. For reference I am 5’4” and 145lbs and ordered a medium, it fit great!
It looked like it was worn! And it smelled like cigarette smoke
This dress is absolutely beautiful and vibrant. I love the material. I didn't have any issues getting wrinkles out and can wear it more than once.
Fit was pretty good. Just didnt fir what i needed it for

This is such a cute dress! I’m 5”4’ 135lbs and the size medium fit perfectly. I’ve worn this to a couple of weddings and have gotten a lot of compliments on it.
5'2 length wasn't too long in medium or large
Nice dress, classy.
5'7 25lbs 40G bra  XXL was a bit loose, but this is a very elegant dress! The material looks great once steamed.
Absolutely loved this dress! I bought it as my Easter dress, and was definitely pleased with it and want to wear it again!

I love this dress and felt so confident in it. Good quality for the price. It came pretty wrinkled but we steamed it and it was perfect. Got tons of compliments. I ordered a medium and was super comfortable. Spacious- the top was a bit big for me but I actually liked that.  I am 5’5, 29in waist, 36A cup and have a big booty. Easy to dance the night away in!
Beautiful colors. True to size. The top is cut really nice. I bought a second one.
Loved the green color. Super comfortable dress, wore to a wedding and reception.

I would like to consider myself a professional wedding guest. I have work this dress to multiple weddings and always get complements. It is very comfortable. The fabric is a little thin but the overall style is extremely forgiving
The dress fit well and wasn’t restraining, definitely recommend
Love this dress. Great quality and fits perfectly. Got lots of compliments.
Very thin cheaply made

It’s a beautiful dress however it took 20 days to receive in the mail. I do understand the hurricanes and flooding could have caused the delay. Only con is the stitching in the back is not down the middle and seems off centered. Hopefully this will not be too noticeable.

Didn’t form fit to the right areas. Felt a little cheap.
Loved the dress. Once ironed, the material falls and flows beautifully.

I loved the top half of this dress!! It looked so classy for the price. However, the bottom half looked cheap especially the waistline. This item is a beautiful dress, but it is used and torn. The replacement will be a month and a half. Terrible costumer service. The person I spoke with was no help at all.

The dress itself is very beautiful. However, it is very sheer you have to lay your undergarments very carefully or you will see the outline of everything. It also came with a hole in it. It’s a cheap dress so the quality is just that…cheap.

评论概述: Loved the fit and so comfy

评论概述: Returned no worth the price very cheaply made
评论详情: **1 Star**  I was really disappointed with this dress. The material is extremely thin, and it doesn't come with a liner, so you’ll need a slip that covers the top too. Worn to my son’s wedding and got loads of compliments. Depending on lighting it appeared navy or turquoise blue.
The dress fit was accurate but the color is a mauve light pink
The dress was perfect. The fabric is quality and love the style. For reference, I’m 5 ft, 130 lbs.
This dress fit true to form. Looks elegant snd is very comfortable. It comes in multiple colors.

I purchased this as a wedding guest dress to wear to two different weddings (semi-formal and cocktail). Blue, size small.  The elegant silhouette made it a great base for a variety of styling options. The blue color catches the sun nicely during early afternoon weddings.  My biggest concerns with this dress were static and wrinkles. I traveled with a steamer, which was essential. I also rubbed a dryer sheet along the inside of the dress before wear and clipped a safety pin into the bottom hem. No static issues with these 2 adjustments.  To clean, I just turned inside out and put it through the wash in a garment bag. Hang dry.

Got a medium after reading reviews, was definitely too big on me. I’m small chested but it fit like a large on my ribcage and the elastic around the waist wasn’t snug on me. The color also says navy, it’s definitely not navy and is a dark turquoise (even more so than the photo shows). Was hopeful but not sure if I’ll bother exchanging for another

This dress was bought as a backup dress for a function, needless to say when  I tried it on, it was perfect and gave me the feel I was looking for. It looked good, felt good and, was less than $40. I am getting ready to order another color. Overall I recommend this dress. Also good quality for price.
Much lighter and more beige than the picture
so many people complimented this dress and its quality! it definitely does not look like a dress from amazon! i am 5’11 and it was perfect length and true to size

This felt and looked more like a $5 SHEIN dress than a $55 off the rack. Fabric felt cheap. Fit weird on me. I’m hour glass figured. Prob best in a darker color to hide how cheap this fabric is. Def return.
It’s affordable, it’s pretty, and I got many compliments. For the price you can’t go wrong with choosing this dress.
Wore to a wedding in Scotland. Felt comfortable all night dancing.  Got the celery green color but it was too summery and sent back for the darker deeper evergreen. Perfect for my eye color.
Not exactly what I was expecting. Maybe better fit for a taller person. I’m about 5’6. It had a nice fabric quality but it was just bunchy on me
Fit perfect
This was a beautiful wedding guest dress! The fabric was a little thin, so I was worried, but it steamed nicely and ended up looking great.

Dress came with white marks all over it likely deodorant stains from previous wearer! Amazon should check articles before sending out to customers especially if the item was previously returned.  Loved the color and fit of dress but u fortunate that I was able to wear to wedding as planned.

评论概述: I'm getting in a few colors
评论详情: So I read all the comments before I bought.  As soon as it got here I sent to the dry cleaners to work out wrinkles and hard creases, it looked great the day of.  I also made sure I showered and put lotion on and did my makeup and hair quite a while before putting in the dress so it wouldn't stain the dress (that was an issue for some per the reviews). The fabric didn't feel cheap and the fit was perfect.  True to size.The dress lasted well all night, I even spilled champagne on it and it didn't really stain!I had gotten sooo many compliments
I bought this cute dress for my daughter to wear to one act play awards. She looked very classy and stylish. She really enjoyed this dress.

Wore this to a summer wedding. So comfortable and stylish

What a beautiful dress! It looks awesome on very comfortable. But… I washed it in cold water per instructions hung dry it thinking the wrinkles would work out. Not so much. Ironed it an unable to remove it the wrinkles. I guess I will try a dry cleaners. I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn’t for the wrinkles! Size I purchased was a Medium

评论概述: Trust the process with this one!

But after steaming it, it was perfect! Got lots of compliments on the dress and it fit very nicely. Perfect wedding guest dress for sure!

I liked it looked exactly like the pictures. It does look expensive. I don't like how the little buttons work around the neck. But that's not a defect. I just have trouble hooking them personally. I would highly recommend. It's form fitting too!
Fit was ok.  Material felt cheap
I love the asymmetrical top and the cinched waist. It was very flattering and I hope I have another occasion to wear it.
Material is very thin and wrinkles easily.  Not worth the money at all.  I will be returning
The bottom was a little more fit and flare than the pictures, but I didn't mind. Overall comfortable and flattering. Wrinkly out of the package, would definitely need to steam before wearing.
Absolutely love the feel, and fit!

Fit me in the chest, but waist was to tight. I am 46 chest with a bit of a tummy.

Great deal on a beautiful occasion dress!

I thought this was a cute dress, but it was very thin. Like you can’t wear undergarments thin. Also, I do think it’s a little matronly and doesn’t quite work for someone who’s younger. I got what I thought was going to be a light green and it’s more like a lime green so I’m returning it. Otherwise I am 5‘5“, 185 pounds and the extra large fit perfectly. I hold most of my weight in my belly and the tucked looking area hides the belly a little bit.

I am “5, 3” and 268lb. I ordered XXL and it fit perfectly. It looks just like the picture color style everything. I didn’t need any alterations. Highly recommend.

absolutely beautiful color, beautiful material everything fit true to size but it was just not sewn quite right around the neck. Even with sewn flaw it just didn't look good.  I think this jumpsuit would be more successful if made as a true halter. If you notice the model has her hair covering the botched design. Too bad. It's a No for me.
Got so many compliments!
Cute dress but awful quality and material. A thread was pulled in the middle of it, essentially ruining the dress. One button on the neck also fell off as I pulled the dress out of its packaging.

评论概述: Pleasant surprise and saved the day!
评论详情: Bought this days before my brother’s wedding. What a pleasant surprise! Simple but very elegant. One of my cousins actually also wore this dress in the hot pink and she looked amazing! Love how it fit, felt and flowed, felt confident all night and danced the night away comfortably. I ordered an XL and L, went with the large and it was still a bit big in the bust area, but not a big deal at all. I am 5’8”, 190-195, 36D, 42-43” hips. Length was great. Would recommend shape wear to smooth things out. I honestly think anyone would look great in this dress :)
The color was stunning!

I have never gotten so many compliments on a dress. The material felt really nice and didn’t wrinkle easily. The dress has a very flattering shape (with some good spanx of course lol). I ordered a hot pink medium and would say it was true to size and very vibrant.

This dress was a hard no for me. I am an XL and oftentimes have a hard time finding dresses that fit me in all the right places.. this one fit in all of the wrong places. Wasn't for me but would look super cute on others!

I rarely do reviews but I feel compelled to for this dress! I absolutely love this dress! The quality of the fabric is great, the fit is perfect. The color is stunning! I ordered to wear to a wedding and received many compliments. It’s a flattering dress and hugs in the right places! I want every color now! I ordered a size small and 5’4 and around 120lb!

I absolutely adored this dress & wore it for a rehearsal dinner. I personally felt it needed a gold chain belt to tie the look together but physically the dress was so comfortable & flattering all night

I had ordered a couple dresses for a wedding that has a specific color palette for guests. I ordered this one to try however ended up returning. The dress was very unflattering for my figure and did not do much. I think it would look great if I was a couple inches taller. I was unable to get the front to look like the picture. Fabric was OK. I would say the fit runs large.
Dress was cute and got a lot of compliments but it made me look extra wide through the hips
Elegant and flows

评论概述: A beautiful dress for a wedding or formal event.

Love everything about this dress. Great fit. Love the neckline. Beautiful color. I wore it to a summer wedding. Material was great, never felt hot in it. Received so many compliments!

Purchased the black. Very flattering. Elastic waist cinches for detail but not too binding, was very comfortable. The fabric quality is excellent. Just the right weight to drape beautifully. A steamer didn’t quite get it, so I turned inside out and steam ironed it. Highly recommend!! Perfect for a formal wedding
Most beautiful and classy dress for a wedding

Comfortable, true to size and a great go to cocktail dress with a sleek hairdo and some fun jewelry.
Color was amazing, material soft  so much compliments.wore to a wedding.
Omg! I loved this! If you’re a curvier woman, definitely size up. Mine was an XL and it’s perfect.
Inferior fabric, pink not even close to picture, but is dull and drab. Very disappointing.

This was a great purchase for an outdoor spring wedding. The fabric is soft and does not show imperfections. It is medium thickness but light enough to breath. Color is just like pictured. The waistline gas elastic that helps give shape.
Pretty dress but see thru on bottom

I love this dress and got so many compliments! I’m 5’2” and wearing a 2XL. I would definitely recommend! I initially ordered the lighter green but sent it back because it was more seafoam than lime. The color of this green was vibrant. The fabric is very soft and has a little stretch to it.
Very pretty fit well wearing to my son's wedding.

This dress so flattering and the fabric is beautiful! It’s comfortable and sophisticated! I wore it to a vineyard wedding and received a lot of compliments. I bought the “blue” but it’s more of a dark teal- loved it even more!

I’m super impressed by this dress. My order came on time. The price was a bit much for the quality, but overall I really enjoy it and it’s perfect for church and weddings. The waist was slightly bigger than I imagined, so I could’ve sized down and it would still fit well. The top is roomy, which is great if you have a bigger bust size, like me. Also the color is true to the photos.

I really loved the style and fit of this dress. The material was of good quality and fit my body perfectly. Being 6 feet tall and a G-cup, I was concerned about the top but it was nothing a good bra couldn’t fix! There is no stretch in the material so be sure to order accordingly. Nevertheless, I still received lots of compliments!
